name: Whispers of a Machine
description: Whispers of a Machine is a Sci-Fi Nordic Noir that tells the story of Vera, a cybernetically augmented detective in a post-AI world, who investigates a string of murders and unravels a dark conflict over forbidden technology.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 300 MHz Processor Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 640 x 360 32 bit DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1 GHz or faster x86 or x64 processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device with WDDM 1.0 or higher driver DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
